official_title: Concurrent resolution requesting the Secretary of Transportation to provide financial assistance to Alaska for purposes of repairing and reconstructing highways damaged by traffic resulting from the construction of the trans-Alaska pipeline.

summary.text: Requests the Secretary of Transportation to provide financial assistance to Alaska for purposes of repairing and reconstructing highways damaged by traffic resulting from the construction of the trans-Alaska pipeline.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution requesting the Secretary of Transportation to provide financial assistance to Alaska for purposes of repairing and reconstructing highways damaged by traffic resulting from the construction of the trans-Alaska pipeline.
